question: 脱税
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: To <kanji>undress</kanji> your <kanji>tax</kanji>es is to throw them away. Just throw it out, who needs 'em? I'm not going to pay these taxes, therefore I am committing <vocabulary>tax evasion</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
